715548f-a.text:
WW. 131st Street, north side, east from Old Broadway and showing prominently at the N.E. corner the Manhattanville Day
Nursery (No. 71-73 Old Broadway).
Adjacent to same on the east is a 2 story garage, No. 52927 W. 131st Street
April 1, 1938.
P.L. Sperr

715549f-b.text:
West 13lst Street, at, adjoining and east of the S.E. corner of Old Broadway (right) as viewed westward. No. 538 is a two story Trane house separating the corner property (No. 67 Old Broadway) from the stone garage (No. 536 West 131st Street). At the right margin appears a portion of the old frame building at the S.W. corner, bearing No's. o6 Old Broadway and 5722 West 13lst
Street.
View No. 2 is limited and shows solely No. 538, the
frane dwelling aforementioned.
View 1: April 1, 1938
P. L. Sperr
J. Clarence Davies Collection
Museum of The City of New York
Neg. No. 318

715550f.text:
541 West 156th Street, north side, between Amsterdam Ave., and
Broadway.
July 19, 1933.
Irvin Fitterman.
